bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a festering throat. Shang han zong bing lun 傷寒總病論 3: 黑龍煎，治咽喉腫痛九種疾…急喉閉、 纏喉風、結喉、爛喉、重舌、木舌、遁蟲、蟲喋、飛絲入喉 , “Decoction with hei long cures nine types of ailments of swollen and aching throats…acute throat closure, throat-constricting wind, bound throat, festering throat , doubled tongue, wooden tongue, run-away bug, floating worm-borer, and flying silk threads entering the throat”.
